title: Prison Officer of the System - Novel Updates
genre: Mystery   Psychological   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Amnesia   Artificial Intelligence   Clones   Death   Futuristic Setting   Mysterious Past   Past Plays a Big Role   Prison   Quiet Characters   Righteous Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Short Story   Shy Characters   Suicides   System Administrator   Tragic Past   Transplanted Memories
author: Xià Wù Qíng   夏勿晴
description:
In the year 2697, the Overseer System has already undertaken the major power of decision-making, upholding stability and granting peace.

Chun He carries on his father’s duties and takes the honorable title of prison officer.

He’s always been a law-abiding person, and thus complies with the Overseer’s rules, determined to be an outstanding prison guard.

But the problem is, Chun He is addicted to tobacco, and the prison prohibits smoking.

And to make matters worse, there’s one prisoner who always has cigarettes……>
